name: kujua-lite
description: SMS data collection designed for rural environments.
long_description: Kujua Lite is a web based SMS data collection and analytics tool focused on community health care workers in rural environments. We help large health organizations collect and analyze data sent from health care workers using ordinary mobile phones.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Default tries to use best option according to browser settings, you can override that here.

locales.title: Locales
locales.description: A list of available locales with a unique short code (egs: 'en', 'fr') and a human readable name of the locale (egs: 'English', 'French')

locale.title: Default Locale Code
locale.description: Default tries to use best option according to browser settings, you can override that here. Must be one of the codes specified in Locales above.

reported_date_format.title: Reported Date Format
reported_date_format.description: Format used to display the reported date field.

replace.title: Replace with
replace.description: The value to replace the match with

outgoing_phone_filters.title: Outgoing Phone Filters
outgoing_phone_filters.description: These filters are applied to every phone number on an outgoing message.  This can be useful if your incoming phone number and outgoing phone number formats are slightly different.

match.title: Match
match.description: A regular expression used to match a phone number.  e.g. \+997

replace.title: Replace with
replace.description: Replace the match with this value.

schedule_morning_hours.title: Scheduled Message Morning Hours
schedule_morning_hours.description: Only send messages on or after this hour.

schedule_morning_minutes.title: Scheduled Message Morning Minutes
schedule_morning_minutes.description: Only send messages on or after this minute.

schedule_evening_hours.title: Scheduled Message Evening Hours
schedule_evening_hours.description: Only send messages on or before this hour.

schedule_evening_minutes.title: Scheduled Message Evening Minutes
schedule_evening_minutes.description: Only send messages on or before this minute.

synthetic_date.title: Synthetic date
synthetic_date.description: Only use this if you are testing message scheduling and want to simulate a specific date. e.g. 201304121200

id_format.title: Patient ID Format
id_format.description: Length of generated numerical identifiers. Note, an extra check digit is always used, so the default value (1111) generates a length of 5.

contact_display_short.title: Short Contact Display
contact_display_short.description: How to render the contact name in short format? e.g. clinic.name, clinic.contact.name, clinic.parent.name

kujua-reporting.title: Scheduled Reports
kujua-reporting.description: The forms to include in reporting rates stats.

condition.title: Condition To Send Alerts
condition.description: Alert will be sent when condition is true. Build condition using the notation `form_code(reports_ago).field_id`. E.g.: The following can be used to send an alert if the value of `s1_avail` in form `STCK` falls below the three month average of `s1_used`: "STCK(0).s1_avail < (STCK(0).s1_used + STCK(1).s1_used + STCK(2).s1_used ) / 3".

message.title: Alert Text
message.description: Text that will be sent out in the alert. Variables names can be used. E.g.: {{clinic.name}}, {{s1_name}}.

recipient.title: Send Alerts To
recipient.description: The email or phone number to receive alerts. Can also use variable name to receive alert. E.g.: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent, name@ngo.org, +15559870000

form.title: Reminder Form Code
form.description: What form is this reminder for?  e.g. ZDIS

text_expression.title: Reminder Text Configuration
text_expression.description: A text expression definition of the schedule.  See http://bunkat.github.io/later/parsers.html#text e.g. at 9am on Monday

cron.title: Reminder Cron Configuration
cron.description: A cron definition of the schedule. Optional, a text expression will override this.  e.g. weekly on Monday at 9am: '0 9 * * 1'

mute_after_form_for.title: Mute Reminders For
mute_after_form_for.description: After receiving a form, how long to mute reminders for.  Supported units: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes. e.g. 5 days

message.title: Reminder Text
message.description: Message to be sent.  The following strings will be substituted into the message: {{week}}, {{year}} and {{form}}.

form.title: Registration Form
form.description: Form code of a registration form. e.g. ANCR

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Available field names for use in validations

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: When form is received trigger actions like enrolling in schedule.

params.title: Parameters
params.description: i.e. if assigning a schedule provide the name.

bool_expr.title: Boolean expression
bool_expr.description: If this expression evaluates to false the trigger will be skipped.

join_responses.title: Join Validation Responses
join_responses.description: By default we send one validation response at a time.  Use this option to join or concatenate all validation response messages in one.  Note, like all outgoing messages it will be truncated at 160 characters.

property.title: Property
property.description: The property on the JSON form to validate.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The validation rule. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Response Message
message.description: The response when validation fails. Mustache templating is supported. Using (two curly brackets), like {{field_name}} variables can be interpreted in the message. In addition to all properties on the record and form field names the following variables are also available in the message: contact, clinic, parent, health_center, grandparent, district. For example, Thank you {{contact.name}} we received your message from {{contact.phone}}. We'll also notify your parent facility {{parent.contact.name}} about your message.

content.title: Message Content
content.default: '{{patient_name}}' is not a valid patient name. Please submit a patient name between 5 and 50 characters.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Set the locale if you need to support responses in multiple languages.

content.title: Message Content
content.description: e.g. Greetings, {{chw_name}}. {{patient_name}} {{patient_id}} is due for a 12 week ANC visit this week. Please visit her and remind her to visit the health facility.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Set the locale if you need to support responses in multiple languages.

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: Contact to recieve the message. Use a field name on registration form or one of the following to reference the facility: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent.

form.title: Report Form
form.description: Form code of the report. e.g. ANCV

silence_type.title: Schedule Name
silence_type.description: Name of reminder schedule(s) to clear after receiving this report.  Name needs to match exactly, e.g. ANC Reminders.  If you need to support clearing multiple schedules then separate the names with commas.

silence_for.title: Silence Window
silence_for.description: The length of time used to find the next reminder group to clear.  Leave blank to clear all reminder groups.  Supported units: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes. e.g. 25 days

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Available field names for use in validations

join_responses.title: Join Validation Responses
join_responses.description: By default we send one validation response at a time.  Use this option to join or concatenate all validation response messages in one.  Note, like all outgoing messages it will be truncated at 160 characters.

property.title: Property
property.description: The property on the JSON form to validate.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The validation rule. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Response Message
message.description: The response when validation fails. Mustache templating is supported. Using (two curly brackets), like {{field_name}} variables can be interpreted in the message. In addition to all properties on the record and form field names the following variables are also available in the message: contact, clinic, parent, health_center, grandparent, district. For example, Thank you {{contact.name}} we received your message from {{contact.phone}}. We'll also notify your parent facility {{parent.contact.name}} about your message.

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: Contact to recieve the message. Use a field name on registration form or one of the following to reference the facility: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name to define this schedule. e.g. ANC Reminders

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A brief summary of this schedule

description.title: Description
description.description: A complete description of this schedule in markdown format

start_from.title: Timestamp Property Name
start_from.description: A timestamp or date property on the record that is used to calculate when messages are sent. e.g. lmp_date.  Use reported_date if you want to reference the date and time the report was received.

content.title: Message Content
content.description: e.g. Greetings, {{chw_name}}. {{patient_name}} {{patient_id}} is due for a 12 week ANC visit this week. Please visit her and remind her to visit the health facility.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Set the locale if you need to support responses in multiple languages.

group.title: Message Group Number
group.description: You can group reminders together by assigning a group number so they can be cleared in batches.

offset.title: Send Message After
offset.description: This value is added to the timestamp property value to determine when to send the message.  Supported units: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes. e.g. 5 days

send_day.title: Send Day
send_day.description: Optionally specify the nearest day to offset.

send_time.title: Send Time
send_time.description: Specify time of day at which the message is to be sent. Ignored if blank. If timezone offset is not specfiied GMT will be used.  e.g. 20:30 +0300

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: Contact to recieve the message. Use a field name on registration form or one of the following to reference the facility: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent.

off_form.title: Stop Notifications Form
off_form.description: When receiving a form of this type, stop sending notifications

on_form.title: Resume Notifications Form
on_form.description: When receiving a form of this type, resume sending notifications

confirm_deactivation.title: Confirm Muting Notifications?
confirm_deactivation.description: Disable stopping of notification based on reports, requires administrator action.

join_responses.title: Join Validation Responses
join_responses.description: By default we send one validation response at a time.  Use this option to join or concatenate all validation response messages in one.  Note, like all outgoing messages it will be truncated at 160 characters.

property.title: Property
property.description: The property on the JSON form to validate.

rule.title: Validation Rule
rule.description: The validation rule. Backslashes must be double escaped.

message.title: Response Message
message.description: The response when validation fails. Mustache templating is supported. Using (two curly brackets), like {{field_name}} variables can be interpreted in the message. In addition to all properties on the record and form field names the following variables are also available in the message: contact, clinic, parent, health_center, grandparent, district. For example, Thank you {{contact.name}} we received your message from {{contact.phone}}. We'll also notify your parent facility {{parent.contact.name}} about your message.

content.title: Message Content
content.description: e.g. Greetings, {{chw_name}}. {{patient_id}} notification will be disabled.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Set the locale if you need to support responses in multiple languages.

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: Contact to recieve the message. Use a field name on registration form or one of the following to reference the facility: reporting_unit, parent, grandparent.

translations.content: Kituo cha Afya cha Mawasiliano Jina
Le recipient du message n'a pas été trouvé.
No se encontro destinatario para el mensaje.
सन्देश​ पाउने व्यक्ति पत्ता लगाउन असफल।​
फारममा भर्नुपर्ने भन्दा अतिरिक्त कुरा भरिएको।

default.default: The form sent '{{form}}' was not recognized. Please complete it again and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

translations.content: The form sent '{{form}}' was not recognized. Please complete it again and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas reconnu, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
No se reconocio el reporte enviado '{{form}}'. Por favor intente de nuevo. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
फारम मिलेन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.default: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

translations.content: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas complet, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
No se completo el reporte '{{form}}'. Por favor completelo y vuelvalo a enviar. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
फारम ​पूरा भएन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.default: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

translations.content: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas complet, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
No se completo el reporte '{{form}}'. Por favor completelo y vuelvalo a enviar. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
फारम  ​पूरा भएन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।
No se encontro a la unidad de salud.
सम्बन्धित स्वास्थ्य संस्था पत्ता लगाउन असफल।

default.default: It looks like you sent an empty message, please try to resend. If you continue to have this problem please contact your supervisor.

translations.content: It looks like you sent an empty message, please try to resend. If you continue to have this problem please contact your supervisor.
Nous avons des troubles avec votre message, SVP renvoyer. Si vous continuez à avoir des problèmes contactez votre superviseur.
El mensaje esta en blanco, por favor reenvielo. Si encuentra un problema, informe al director.
सन्देश​ खाली छ​ । कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

default.default: Your form submission was received, thank you.

translations.content: Your form submission was received, thank you.
Merci, votre formulaire a été bien reçu.

default.default: SMS message received; it will be reviewed shortly. If you were trying to submit a text form, please enter a correct form code and try again.

translations.content: SMS message received; it will be reviewed shortly. If you were trying to submit a text form, please enter a correct form code and try again.
Merci, votre message a été bien reçu.
Recibimos tu mensaje, lo procesaremos pronto. Si querias mandar un reporte, intentalo nuevamente en el formato adecuado.
सन्देश​ प्राप्त भयो। रिपोर्ट पठाउनुभएको हो भने मिलेन; ​पुन:​ पठाउनुहोला।

default.default: Reporting Unit ID is incorrect. Please correct and submit a complete report again.

translations.content: Reporting Unit ID is incorrect. Please correct and submit a complete report again.
Établissement non trouvé, svp corriger et renvoyer
No encontramos a su centro de salud. Por favor corrijalo y reenvie el reporte.
रिपोर्टिङ् युनिटको आइ.डि मिलेन। कृपया ​मिलाएर​  ​पुन:​ पठाउनुहोला।
